DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety efficacy short course radiotherapy ( 40 Gy / 5 fraction / 29 day ) treatment low- intermediate-risk prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Dose-escalated Hypofractionated Radiotherapy For Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Men > 18 year Histologically confirm prostate adenocarcinoma Low lowintermediate risk prostate cancer , define Clinical stage T12b , Gleason Score < =6 , PSA < 15 ng/mL , OR Clinical stage T12b , Gleason Score 7 , PSA < =10 ng/mL Prior pelvic radiotherapy Anticoagulation medication ( unsafe discontinue gold seed insertion ) Diagnosis bleed diathesis Presence hip prosthesis Pelvic girth > 40cm Large prostate ( > 90cm3 ) imaging Severe low urinary tract symptom ( International Prostate Symptom Score > 19 nocturia > 3 )
